prompts.Name: Today's Thoughts
prompts.Prompt: What are you thinking about today? Any recurring thoughts that you can't get out of your head?

prompts.Name: Graditude is Rad-itude
prompts.Prompt: What are you thankful for today? Try to name 2 or 3 things.
prompts.PlaceholderText:
No barking from the dog
No smog
Mama cooked breakfast with no hog

prompts.Name: My Media Diet
prompts.Prompt: What are you consuming lately? Games, movies, music, books... anything!

prompts.Name: Today's Top Tasks
prompts.Prompt:
Name 3 tasks that are essential for today.
If you did these, you've done the bare minimum for a successful day!
